ceo_buyer.justification: Cygnus Managing Director, David Southam, said:...

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The announcement details exploration results on the Bencubbin Project, which is already 100% owned by Cygnus Metals; no new interest is being acquired.

currency.justification: The company's cash position is reported in '$' and it is an ASX-listed company (ASX:CY5), implying AUD. Post-quarter share issuance is also reported in AUD.

cash_payments_raw.justification: No transaction is taking place for the Bencubbin project in this announcement; it is an exploration update on an owned asset.

share_payments_raw.justification: No transaction is taking place for the Bencubbin project in this announcement.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: No transaction is taking place for the Bencubbin project in this announcement.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No share issuance is mentioned in relation to the Bencubbin project.

issued_share_price.justification: No share price is mentioned in relation to the Bencubbin project.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: Future work includes aircore and auger drilling, but no specific meterage is defined as a contractual commitment.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: A program is 'approved', but no specific monetary value for the commitment is stated.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Follow-up air core drilling to infill and extend known mineralisation, plus a regional program of auger drilling.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: Follow-up air core drilling is due to commence... In addition, a regional program of auger drilling is planned to step out significantly along strike...

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Return (NSR) royalty is mentioned in relation to the Bencubbin project.

resource_size_desc.justification: The announcement reports high-grade exploration intersections (e.g., 23m @ 1,862ppm TREO) but does not state a formal JORC-compliant resource estimate for the project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The document is a report from Cygnus Metals Limited (ASX: CY5).
